problem.markdown:
In this comparison, which computer part is analogous to human long term memory?
[[Motherboard, CPU/Processor, RAM, Video Card, Power Supply, (Hard Disk), Optical Drive]]
[explanation] The Hard Disk is like long term memory because it is where all files are stored on a machine. [explanation]
